Package com.vserdiuk.json.utility.service

Interface JsonService

public interface JsonService
Service interface for various JSON operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    convertCsvToJson(String csv)
    Converts a CSV string to a JSON array of objects.

  • Method Details

    • validateJson

      boolean validateJson(String json)
      Validates if the provided JSON string is valid.
      Parameters:
      json - JSON string to validate
      Returns:
      true if JSON is valid, otherwise false

    • prettyPrintJson

      String prettyPrintJson(String json)
      Returns a pretty-printed version of the given JSON string.
      Parameters:
      json - JSON string to pretty print
      Returns:
      pretty-printed JSON string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid

    • mergeJson

      String mergeJson(String json1, String json2)
      Merges two JSON strings into a single JSON object.
      Parameters:
      json1 - the first JSON string
      json2 - the second JSON string
      Returns:
      merged JSON string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either input JSON is invalid

    • validateJsonWithSchema

      boolean validateJsonWithSchema(String json, String schema)
      Validates a JSON string against a JSON Schema.
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string to validate
      schema - the JSON Schema string
      Returns:
      true if the JSON is valid according to the schema, otherwise false
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if either JSON or schema is invalid

    • minifyJson

      String minifyJson(String json)
      Decreases the size of JSON by minifying it (removing whitespace, line breaks, etc).
      Parameters:
      json - JSON string to minify
      Returns:
      minified JSON string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid

    • sortJson

      String sortJson(String json, String sortByField)
      Sorts the JSON object keys alphabetically. If a field name is provided, sorts arrays of objects by that field.
      Parameters:
      json - JSON string to sort
      sortByField - field to sort array objects by (can be null for default alphabetical sort)
      Returns:
      sorted JSON string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid

    • findInJson

      List<String> findInJson(String json, String searchTerm)
      Searches for a term in the JSON (keys or values) and returns matching JSON paths.
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON to search
      searchTerm - the term to search for
      Returns:
      list of JSON paths where the term is found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid

    • convertJsonToCsv

      String convertJsonToCsv(String json)
      Converts a JSON array of objects to CSV format.
      Parameters:
      json - JSON array string
      Returns:
      CSV string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid or not an array

    • convertCsvToJson

      String convertCsvToJson(String csv)
      Converts a CSV string to a JSON array of objects.
      Parameters:
      csv - the CSV string
      Returns:
      JSON array string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the CSV is invalid

    • convertJsonToXml

      String convertJsonToXml(String json)
      Converts JSON to XML format.
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string
      Returns:
      XML string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid

    • convertXmlToJson

      String convertXmlToJson(String xml)
      Converts XML to JSON format.
      Parameters:
      xml - the XML string
      Returns:
      JSON string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input XML is invalid

    • convertJsonToExcel

      String convertJsonToExcel(String json)
      Converts a JSON array of objects to an Excel file (as a Base64-encoded string).
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON array string
      Returns:
      Base64-encoded Excel file (XLSX)
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid or not an array

    • convertExcelToJson

      String convertExcelToJson(String base64Excel)
      Converts a Base64-encoded Excel file to a JSON array of objects.
      Parameters:
      base64Excel - Base64-encoded Excel file (.xlsx)
      Returns:
      JSON array string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input is invalid

    • convertJsonToYaml

      String convertJsonToYaml(String json)
      Converts JSON to YAML format.
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string
      Returns:
      YAML string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid

    • convertYamlToJson

      String convertYamlToJson(String yaml)
      Converts YAML to JSON format.
      Parameters:
      yaml - the YAML string
      Returns:
      JSON string
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input YAML is invalid

    • generateTypeDefinitionsFromJson

      String generateTypeDefinitionsFromJson(String json)
      Generates TypeScript type definitions and documentation from JSON.
      Parameters:
      json - the JSON string
      Returns:
      generated TypeScript type definitions
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the input JSON is invalid
